user_input: Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use Hydrogen as the carrier. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Use Germany.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios using scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', 'NT_LE' for the years 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050, limited to Germany.

tasks.description: Generate hourly demand profiles by decomposing annual demand figures for the TYNDP 2026 scenarios, filtered to Germany.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the relevant demand objects from the PLEXOS model for update.

tasks.description: Add a new energy carrier object for Hydrogen to the PLEXOS model.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, identify the correct location in the model to add the Hydrogen carrier.

tasks.description: Split the nodes in the model into subsets as required.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, determine which nodes in the model require splitting.
